1. To develop an AI-powered education platform, PREVENT-IA, that provides personalized training to workers with risk activities, including managers, certification candidates, site managers, transporters, logistics, commissioning, and assembly. The platform will offer features such as chat for resolving doubts, content annotation, and complement content with verified sources to ensure high-quality education.

2. To ensure the scalability, security, and reliability of PREVENT-IA, the platform will utilize AWS for cloud computing, CI/CD for continuous integration and delivery, autoscaling groups for handling traffic fluctuations, and secrets management for secure access to sensitive data. The platform will also use Python, REST API, UI/UX, React, and Figma for development.

3. To address potential risks, the platform will prioritize user experience and feedback, ensuring user-friendly interfaces and regular updates based on user feedback. The platform will also comply with AI use regulations and provide transparent information on energy consumption and dependence on AI model providers. Additionally, the platform will measure training quality through report generation, learning outcomes evaluation, and a learning results dashboard.
